name: fsl-lezer
description: FSL grammar in Lezer, to make FSL and JSSM available to CodeMirror

scripts.clean: rimraf -f build && mkdir build && cd build && mkdir lezer && cd .. && rimraf -f dist && mkdir dist && cd dist && mkdir lezer && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lezer

author: John Haugeland <stonecypher@gmail.com>
